alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 17 at 3:21PM MST until January 18 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Eastern Lincoln County, South Central Mountains, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
